attributes.action: prosecute all MP's fraudulently claiming expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not an "accident" to claim     £16 000 for a mortguage that has already been paid. This is just a sample of the scandel going on at the moment and if it happened in any other business the accused would be prosecuted for fraud or theft. MP's should not be treated any differently.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
